Term.Name: PHP
Term.Notes: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language.

Term.Name: QuerySelector
Term.Notes: Query Selector returns the first element within the document (using depth-first pre-order traversal of the document's nodes) that matches the specified group of selectors.

Term.Name: Functions
Term.Notes: Javascript Blocks of Code to Preform a Task

Term.Name: Alert
Term.Notes: Javascript Function to call an alert to the users screen

Term.Name: Constructor
Term.Notes: A manual way Javascript handles building out arrays from user input

Term.Name: document.getElementById
Term.Notes: Grabbing input from a div containing an ID
